name: The Graveyard Shift | Horror Speedrun
description:
Grab a bite to eat before heading out to The Graveyard Shift. QUICK!

Official end time on is on the spawned time-box after walking out the front door. Speedrun.com approved: https://www.speedrun.com/thegraveyardshift

Will add more speedrun.com categories as new features are added.

Early Development. Bugs are being fixed as they are found/seen.

*If the original is giving you problems (torch lit in beginning, bad triggers, etc) download V2. Does not affect speed.* Ideas are very much welcomed in the comments!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Look Around - Mouse

Jump - Space

Run - Shift

Use/Press/Pickup Item - Left Mouse Button

Hold/Release Object - Right Mouse Button

Flashlight - F
